alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Comal; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Kendall, northwestern Bexar and southwestern Comal Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bulverde, or 11 miles northwest of Selma, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Boerne, Leon Valley, Fair Oaks Ranch, Bulverde, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Cross Mountain, Timberwood Park, Leon Springs, The Dominion, Smithson Valley, Hill Country Village, Cascade Caverns, Anhalt, Specht Store, Fiesta Texas and Scenic Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
